item.title: [Resolved]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This is what I got:

	public void resetPrayers() {
		for(int i = 0; i < c.prayerActive.length; i++) {
			c.prayerActive[i] = false;
			c.ProtectItem = false;
			c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[i], 0);
		}
		c.headIcon = -1;
		c.getPA().requestUpdates();
	}

I also got one for resetCurses if you have them defined separately.

Read full topic

item.title: [Resolved]
item.dc:creator: @darthbonsly darthbonsly
item.description:
@darthbonsly wrote:

I had the ids for my prayer icons changed and proceeded to change them in my clickingbuttons, however it occurred to me that I needed to find out how to go about resetting the glow for active prayers.

So far, the best I’ve found is:

for(int p = 0; p < PRAYER.length; p++) { // reset prayer glows prayerActive[p] = false; getPA().sendFrame36(PRAYER_GLOW[p], 0); }

I’m a bit new to PI and am not sure where to go to add in the new ids. Could anyone point out as to where I would fill them in?

Read full topic
